price: 192. Maar als zij zich overgeven, dan is Allah de Alvergevende, de Genadevolle.
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
